components/common/compare-checkbox:
<input
  type="checkbox"
  class="input-checkbox sr-only"
  id="compare-{{id}}"
  data-compare-checkbox
  data-compare-id="{{id}}"
  data-compare-title="{{name}}"
  data-compare-url="{{url}}"
  data-compare-price="{{price.without_tax.formatted}}"
  data-compare-thumbnail="{{getImage image 'thumb' (cdn default_image)}}">
components/common/pagination:
{{#if links.length}}
{{#each links}} {{number}} {{/each}}
{{/if}}
components/search/product-listing-list:
{{#each product_results.products}} {{> components/products/product-list-item show_rating=../settings.show_product_rating show_compare=../product_results.show_compare image_ratio=../theme_settings.product_grid_image_ratio default_image=../theme_settings.default-product-image quick_shop=../theme_settings.quick-shop as_low_as=../theme_settings.price_as_low_as}} {{/each}}
{{> components/common/pagination pagination.product_results}}
